sys_openapi_operation.name: Gets all disruptions for the specified StopPointId, plus disruptions for any child Naptan records it may have.

openapi.display_value: Transport for London Unified API - v1

sys_openapi_operation.sys_name: Gets all disruptions for the specified StopPointId, plus disruptions for any child Naptan records it may have.
